- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Ron, Sure thing, you are very welcome. Hope you have a lovely holiday season as well! Take care,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com [mailto:ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 24, 2012 7:33 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Marketing Solutions for Small Business Thank you. I will pull the site up later when o hot a printer and review the contents. You,be been a lot of help. Thank you. Have a good holiday season.
Sent from my HTC One X, an AT&T 4G LTE smartphone
----- Reply message ----- From: "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "Ronald J. Walker" <ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com <mailto:ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com>> Subject: Marketing Solutions for Small Business Date: Wed, Oct 24, 2012 2:21 PM
Hi Ron,
I must admit I am not totally familiar with what you are reference below but I do have a guide on value based pricing that you may find useful:

From: Ronald J. Walker [mailto:ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com<http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaV5XtEty4bKOI6XmmifgY5mgtLMzCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> <mailto:ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com%3chttp://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:ronaldj.walker@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaV5XtEty4bKOI6XmmifgY5mgtLMzCvjruKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D%3e>] Sent: Tuesday, October 23, 2012 7:00 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Marketing Solutions for Small Business
Sara, again, thank you for the information. I need a favor of you. Could you provide me with or refer me to a company which uses a sample format for a consulting contract agreement or service arrangement which shows how you approach a lower price with initial consultation and a graduated arrangement for the increase in a negotiated percentage of payment for any type of services rendered to a client? By utilizing the value-based fee formula? I conduct consulting and liaison services for both instances. Let me explain so you may understand how I approach things. The value based-fee approach may work good in this sense. The formulas may be the following or if I provide a 5-25% percent discount, it may be</html
